---
title: "Bayes Networks for Unanticipated Possibilities"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r cars}
library(bnlearn)

dag <- empty.graph(nodes = c("H","E"))

arc.set <- matrix(c("H", "E"),
                  byrow = TRUE, ncol = 2,
                  dimnames = list(NULL, c("from", "to"))
                  )

arcs(dag) <- arc.set
nodes(dag)      
arcs(dag)
graphviz.plot(dag)

H.lv <- c("affair", "friends")
E.lv <- c("true", "false")
H.prob <- array(c(0.1,0.9), dim = 2, dimnames = list(H = H.lv))
E.prob <- array(c(0.9,0.1,0.5,0.5), dim = c(2,2), dimnames = list(E = E.lv, H = H.lv))
cpt <- list(H = H.prob, E = E.prob)
cpt
bn <- custom.fit(dag, cpt)
bn.fit.barchart(bn$E, main = "Travel",
                xlab = "Pr(H | E)", ylab = "")
```
